data.name: Tauren
data.description:
The Horde - Tauren [W]
Units:
+15% hit points
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+20% damage
-5% cost

Upgrades:
+3Lv Melee Weapons

Magic:
Spirit Protection (20% dmg reduction in 200 AoE)
Impale (Deals 100 dmg and stuns for 1s)
Ancestral Spirit (Revives one unit)

Traits: Slow and steady wins the race! It is not about dealing damage, its about outliving enemy. Damage output rises slowly and peaks in late game. It depends on brute force and so cannot be denied or dispelled.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Trade Routes Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Arcane Aura
auras.description:
+6 HP/s unit regeneration
(affects organic units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Endurance Aura
auras.description:
+25% unit attack speed
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Earth Elemental [Q]
bonuses.description:
Rock replaces Sparky

Special Unit (Melee)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Earth Shield (Self Spell)
10-16 bonus armor
(15 second cooldown)

Craggy Skin (Passive Skill)
40-70 dmg to melee attacker

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
15-27% for 140-260 area damage

Great Impale (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage, 3-9s stun
(45 second cooldown)

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Bloodhoof Veterans [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Indomitable Will

Reduces spell damage to Axeman, Pikeslinger, Spirit Medium and Champion by 20%, increases their hit points by 25 and armor by 2.

Type: Anti Magic / Unit Power

bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

towerUpgrades.name: Crucial Hit
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage
Affects: Axeman

Lv1: 10% for 2.75x damage
Lv2: 20% for 3x damage
Lv3: 30% for 3.25x damage
Lv4: 40% for 3.5x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Indomitable Will
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus hit points and damage block
Affects: Axeman and Champion

Lv1: +25 hit points, 20% to block 20 damage
Lv2: +50 hit points, 25% to block 30 damage
Lv3: +75 hit points, 30% to block 40 damage
Lv4: +100 hit points, 35% to block 50 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Impaling Force
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage
Affects: Pikeslinger and Pike Tower

Lv1: 10% for 1.75x damage
Lv2: 20% for 2x damage
Lv3: 30% for 2.25x damage
Lv4: 40% for 2.5x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Power Throw
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage, range and attack rate
Affects: Pikeslinger

Lv1: +8 damage, +25 range, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +16 damage, +50 range, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +24 damage, +75 range, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +32 damage, +100 range, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Pulverize
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage on each attack
Affects: Champion

Lv1: 10% to do 20 damage in 150 AoE
Lv2: 20% to do 30 damage in 175 AoE
Lv3: 30% to do 40 damage in 200 AoE
Lv4: 40% to do 50 damage in 225 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Earth's Embrace
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: self healing ability
Affects: Axeman, Champion and Pikeslinger

Lv1: heals 75 HP
Lv2: heals 150 HP
Lv3: heals 225 HP
Lv4: heals 300 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Earth's Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor increase ability
Affects: Spirit Medium
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +3 armor for 60 seconds
Lv2: +6 armor for 80 seconds
Lv3: +9 armor for 100 seconds
Lv4: +12 armor for 120 seconds

spells.name: Earth's Shield - [Level 1]
spells.description:
Increases friendly unit's armor by 3.
Lasts 60 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Fire Shatter
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage on each attack
Affects: Wyvern
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 15% to do 30 damage in 150 AoE
Lv2: 30% to do 40 damage in 175 AoE
Lv3: 45% to do 50 damage in 200 AoE
Lv4: 60% to do 60 damage in 225 AoE

spells.name: Phase Shift (Lv1)
spells.description: Causes this unit to shift out of existence whenever it takes damage, temporarily avoiding any further damage.

towerUpgrades.name: Proof of Strength
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage in 1500 AoE
Affects: Killed enemy Heroes

Lv1: +25% damage for 45 seconds
Lv2: +50% damage for 95 seconds
Lv3: +75% damage for 145 seconds
Lv4: +100% damage for 195 seconds

heroes.name: Chieftain
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
War Stomp (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4s stun
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
15-27% for 120-240 area damage

Devotion Aura (Support Aura)
2-8 armor bonus

Lifeguard (Self Spell)
heals 8000-14000 HP over 10s
(240 second cooldown)

skills.name: War Stomp - [Level 5]
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AOws,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and stunning them for <AOws,Dur4> seconds.

skills.name: Lifeguard - [Level 1]
skills.description: Protects from all damage and heals 4000 hit points over 10 seconds.

heroes.name: Champion
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Assassin

Can learn:
Battle Spirit (Self Spell)
20-80% bonus attack rate for 15s
(60 second cooldown)

Tauren Vitality (Self Spell)
500-2000 HP over 10s, 10-22 bonus HP/s for 15-33s
(45 second cooldown)

Evasion (Passive Skill)
13-25% to evade an attack

Critical Strike (Passive Skill)
27-45% to do 4x damage
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

skills.name: Regeneration - [Level 1]
skills.description: Heals 500 hit points over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Berserk - [Level 1]
skills.description: Causes this unit to attack 10% faster.

heroes.name: Earth Keeper
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

(60-120 second cooldown)

skills.name: Impale - [Level 4]
skills.description: Shoots spiked tendrils out in a straight line, dealing 175 damage and hurling enemy ground units into the air in their wake, stunning them for 2.5 seconds.

skills.name: Healing Wave - [Level 4]
skills.description: Heals up to 3 units for 200 hit points.

skills.name: Arcane Aura - [Level 1]
skills.description: Increases nearby friendly units' life regeneration by 1 HP/sec.

skills.name: Resurrection - [Level 1]
skills.description: Brings back to life the corpses of 5 friendly nearby units.

skills.name: Thunder Wave - [Level 1]
skills.description: Sends a wave of force out in a straight line, dealing 250 damage and stunning enemy units for 3 seconds.

spells.description: Raises a fallen Tauren from the dead.

spells.name: Spirit Link (Lv1)
spells.description:
